headline: Hivelocity Announces Sale of Chicago and Miami Colocation Services
summary: TAMPA, Fla., August 27, 2025--Hivelocity announces the sale of its colocation services business in Chicago (ORD1) and Miami (MIA2) to Digital Realty.

raw.headline: Hivelocity Announces Sale of Chicago and Miami Colocation Services

headline: How BMO Capital’s Top Pick Endorsement Could Shape Digital Realty Trust’s (DLR) AI-Driven Growth Story
summary: BMO Capital recently reaffirmed its Outperform rating on Digital Realty Trust and named the company its top pick in the data center sector, highlighting strong demand, favorable pricing, and AI-driven infrastructure expansion as key factors. This recognition points to Digital Realty Trust's role as a leading beneficiary of hyperscale investment and artificial intelligence trends in the data center market. Let's explore how BMO Capital’s endorsement, grounded in robust AI-driven demand, might...
